title: Start
body:
A lone dragon gazes over the neon city below, his once-mighty wings reduced to fragile remnants of their former glory
"Strange, being small just doesn't feel right" he mutters.
His mind drifts to a memory, the comforting voice of his Master.
"You'll be a magnificent dragon, Vilio. One that humans would put their trust in and won't fear you"
"I believe in you."
With those words echoing in his heart, Vilio feels a newfound resolve ignite with him.
He must find his Master, no matter how far he has to go.
Together, they will roam the world once more.
"I will find you, Master... no matter where you are."
